prompt_base: cinematic portrait of an extremely powerful fusion warrior, intense determined eyes, spiky black hair, iconic Metamoran fusion vest (black and yellow segmented padding), white pants, blue sash
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, realistic fabric weave, sharp focus on padding texture, subsurface scattering, individual hair strands, intense energy aura, hyper-muscular physique
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, low quality, deformed anatomy, blurry clothes
